slow.dialogue: Heeeeeey Peri...*yawn*...winkle. How goes it? Having fuuuuun with the new flock?
Let me cut you off there little guy, you’re going a liiiitle too fast for me--*yaaaaawn*...
Now see, I take it nice and slow and I don’t have to worry about <i/>anything<i/>. I don’t bump into other birds and I have all the time I want to get to my spot.
It’s just me, this pillow, and the sky above me. Understand? (And don’t ask where I got the feathers for the pillow...)
